page.title: 13COMMUNICATIONS
page.content: Communications between the inner & outer areas of the villages concerned are primarily by telephone which most homes have.Vandalism has spelt the demise of the public call box; the only one remaining is in Hothfield & this one has had to be moved & has been threatened with complete removal for economic reasons due very much to vandalism.Private & business people, advertisers & mail order catalogues make good use of the postal services. Free space is available in local papers for area news & events & also for items below Â£30.00.Free adverising papers are also delivered as are others to order.Parish,church & village magazines/news-letters are also informative.County,national,local & citizens band radio & television bring local,national & worldwide news.
